messages.help:
Here's a list of available commands to use

â€¢ /latest_sermon - Stream or download the most recent CCI sermon
â€¢ /get_sermon - Get a specific sermon by title
â€¢ /get_devotional - Get today's devotional
â€¢ /mute - Mute notifications
â€¢ /menu - Gives you a menu of available commands

messages.admin_menu:
Admin Commands

â€¢ /stats - View bot statistics
â€¢ /broadcast - This allows you to send broadcasts to all the users on the bot.

Use /bc_help for instructions on how to send broadcasts.
messages.bc_help:
How to use broadcast types â€¢ /bc_text - Send written text broadcast
â€¢ /bc_photo - Send a photo with/without caption as broadcast.
â€¢ /bc_video - Send a video clip (must be less than 50mb) as broadcast with/without caption
â€¢ /bc_animation - Send short animated gif as broadcast with/without caption.

To view broadcast menu use /broadcast
